title: Criminal Appeals to County Courts
content:
Criminal Appeals to County Courts

State Regulations
§ 200.30 - Applicability of sections 200.30-200.33
§ 200.31 - Judges who may stay judgment pending appeal to county court
§ 200.32 - Duration of order staying or suspending execution of judgment
§ 200.33 - Perfection of criminal appeals
§ 200.40 - Obligation of the court to advise of right to counsel on people's appeal

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
